source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View document_case_type_dim is created

%%sql
-- Build document_case_type_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW document_case_type_dim_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Abbreviation IS NULL
        THEN T3.DocumentCaseTypeID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS DocumentCaseTypeID,
    T1.DisplayOrder                 AS DisplayOrder,
    T1.Abbreviation                 AS Abbreviation,
    T1.SubtypeId                    AS SubtypeID,
    T1.Name                         AS Name,
    T1.DisplayName                  AS DisplayName,
    T1.AppTypeGrp                   AS AppTypeGrp,
    T1.StartDate                    AS StartDate,
    T1.EndDate                      AS EndDate,
    T1.CaseworkType                 AS CaseworkType,
    T1.BinderId                     AS BinderId,
    T1.ReferencePrefix              AS ReferencePrefix,
    T1.TemplateName                 AS TemplateName,
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.DisplayOrder,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.Abbreviation,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.SubtypeId,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.Name,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.DisplayName,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.AppTypeGrp,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.StartDate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.EndDate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.CaseworkType,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.BinderId,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.ReferencePrefix,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.TemplateName,'.')
        ))                          AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.document_case_reference T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "DocumentTree" = T2.Description AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.document_case_type_dim T3 
    ON T1.Abbreviation = T3.Abbreviation AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.Abbreviation = T3.Abbreviation AND md5(
            concat(
                IFNULL(T1.CaseUniqueId,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.CaseNodeId,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.CaseReference,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.CaseParentId,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.CaseCreateDate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.CaseCloseDate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.CaseCloseStatus,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.CaseOwnerId,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.ChangeTypeStartedAt,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.ChangeTypeStartedBy,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.CaseTypeId,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.CaseLockedAt,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.CaseLockedBy,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.CaseLockedFor,'.')
            )) <> T3.RowID  -- same record, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.Abbreviation IS NULL -- new record
        THEN 'Y'
    ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.Abbreviation IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.document_case_type)

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View document_case_type_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW document_case_type_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
SELECT 
    DocumentCaseTypeID,
    DisplayOrder,
    Abbreviation,
    SubtypeID,
    Name,
    DisplayName,
    AppTypeGrp,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    CaseworkType,
    BinderId,
    ReferencePrefix,
    TemplateName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    

From document_case_type_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    DocumentCaseTypeID,
    DisplayOrder,
    Abbreviation,
    SubtypeID,
    Name,
    DisplayName,
    AppTypeGrp,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    CaseworkType,
    BinderId,
    ReferencePrefix,
    TemplateName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.document_case_type_dim
WHERE Abbreviation IN (SELECT Abbreviation FROM document_case_type_dim_new WHERE DocumentCaseTypeID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM document_case_type_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW document_case_type_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    DocumentCaseTypeID,
    DisplayOrder,
    Abbreviation,
    SubtypeID,
    Name,
    DisplayName,
    AppTypeGrp,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    CaseworkType,
    BinderId,
    ReferencePrefix,
    TemplateName,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM document_case_type_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View document_case_type_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.document_case_type_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.document_case_type_dim AS Target
USING document_case_type_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.DocumentCaseTypeID = Target.DocumentCaseTypeID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        DocumentCaseTypeID,
        DisplayOrder,
        Abbreviation,
        SubtypeID,
        Name,
        DisplayName,
        AppTypeGrp,
        StartDate,
        EndDate,
        CaseworkType,
        BinderId,
        ReferencePrefix,
        TemplateName,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (
        Source.DocumentCaseTypeID,
        Source.DisplayOrder,
        Source.Abbreviation,
        Source.SubtypeID,
        Source.Name,
        Source.DisplayName,
        Source.AppTypeGrp,
        Source.StartDate,
        Source.EndDate,
        Source.CaseworkType,
        Source.BinderId,
        Source.ReferencePrefix,
        Source.TemplateName,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.document_case_type_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new document_case_type_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.document_case_type_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DocumentCaseTypeID NULLS LAST) AS DocumentCaseTypeID,
    DisplayOrder,
    Abbreviation,
    SubtypeID,
    Name,
    DisplayName,
    AppTypeGrp,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    CaseworkType,
    BinderId,
    ReferencePrefix,
    TemplateName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.document_case_type_dim;
